# AzureHelper

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of AzureHelper is to wrap parts of the Azure API and simplify interactions with other [Azure R packages](https://github.com/Azure?q=&type=&language=r&sort=)

## Installation

You can install the released version of AzureHelper from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
devtools::install::github('runapp-aus/AzureHelper')
```

## Note 

This package is currently under development.
